subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders’ runs in the playoffs and at the Coliseum ended with a loss to the Capitals in Washington on Monday night, dampening the spirits of many of the team’s longtime fans.
snippet: The Islanders’ runs in the playoffs and at the Coliseum ended with a loss to the Capitals in Washington on Monday night, dampening the spirits of many of the team’s longtime fans.
